thread.section_title: Melbourne Watch Company Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Melbourne Watch Company | melbournewatch.com.au
thread.title: GregO
thread.title_full: Melbourne Watch Company reviewed by GregO

author: GregO
title: GregO
text: Melbourne Watches are the real deal. In my collection they stand tall next to watches costing much more. They care about Quality Control, so each beautifully-designed watch is premium quality, head and shoulders above regular store watches. Customer service is easy and best ever. I I keep coming back, and have now bought three.
